summary: I have been into Michael Sheen ever since I first saw him in Underworld. And I LOVE how people of a different age group and such...
caption:
I have been into Michael Sheen ever since I first saw him in Underworld. And I LOVE how people of a different age group and such are finding out about him and his great talent, thanks to Good Omens. 

BUT…have ya’ll freakin’ seen him as Lucian?! And if you have, why isn’t everyone drooling over Mr.grumpy-goth-werewolf!!?? aaaiñ

summary:
I feel like Good Omens was less people discovering Michael Sheen and more like realizing his range. Noticing him 

Because I’ve...
body:
I feel like Good Omens was less people discovering Michael Sheen and more like realizing his range. Noticing him


Because I’ve seen bits of Masters of Sex and a few other things he was in and I was like eh yeah sure I know this guy vaguely


But seeing how he transformed unrecognizably in Good Omens really shook me like damn ok Michael I see you now. Pardon me

reblog.comment:
I feel like Good Omens was less people discovering Michael Sheen and more like realizing his range. Noticing him


Because I’ve seen bits of Masters of Sex and a few other things he was in and I was like eh yeah sure I know this guy vaguely


But seeing how he transformed unrecognizably in Good Omens really shook me like damn ok Michael I see you now. Pardon me

But seeing how he transformed unrecognizably in Good Omens really shook me like damn ok Michael I see you now. Pardon me
